name: To Die
description:
Every one hundred years, a party of four is chosen. To make the sacred journey to save the village from destruction and death.

You are the leader. Your party trusts you. A choice must be made. Their lives are in your hands.

This is a narrative driven game, it's a first for us because our other games are generally gameplay focused or arcade styled. So this is a very exciting project to work on. This game features a fully fleshed out storyline with multiple endings. Some might notice that we have hidden a secret ending in there with a special something at the end.

You will only need your mouse to play this game. Enjoy!
